content.query:
drop external table externalweather
drop table factweather
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalWeather (
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    weather_id_value INT,
    weather_main_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_icon_value NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/processed_weather/part-00000-65c175e9-6458-47e8-b881-daf49fe6c8f7-c000.snappy.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);

CREATE TABLE FactWeather (
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME2,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    weather_combined_value NVARCHAR(100),
    date DATE
);
INSERT INTO FactWeather (
    clouds_all,
    feels_like_K,
    humidity,
    pressure,
    temp_K,
    temp_max_K,
    temp_min_K,
    wind_deg,
    wind_gust,
    wind_speed,
    location,
    date_time,
    id,
    temp_C,
    temp_min_C,
    temp_max_C,
    feels_like_C,
    temp_F,
    temp_min_F,
    temp_max_F,
    feels_like_F,
    weather_combined_value,
    date
)
SELECT 
    clouds_all,
    feels_like_K,
    humidity,
    pressure,
    temp_K,
    temp_max_K,
    temp_min_K,
    wind_deg,
    wind_gust,
    wind_speed,
    location,
    CAST(date_time AS DATETIME2) AS date_time,
    id,
    temp_C,
    temp_min_C,
    temp_max_C,
    feels_like_C,
    temp_F,
    temp_min_F,
    temp_max_F,
    feels_like_F,
    CONCAT(weather_id_value, '_', weather_icon_value) AS weather_combined_value, 
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO
